product_name: Komperdell Titanal Contour Antishock Trekking Poles - Pair - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Reducing strain on your knees and ankles, the fully adjustable Titanal Contour Antishock Trekking Poles will help you up and down even the most rugged terrain on backpacking trips.
short_description: Reducing strain on your knees and ankles, the fully adjustable Titanal Contour Antishock Trekking Poles will help you up and down even the most rugged terrain on backpacking trips.
